dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back! Here's what's happening today.

about.title: About QuickQueue
about.subtitle: We're transforming how businesses manage customer flow and enhance service experiences. Our mission is to eliminate wait-time frustrations and maximize operational efficiency, providing a smoother, more satisfying experience for both customers and businesses.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe no one should have to waste valuable time standing in line. By leveraging technology and innovation, we're transforming traditional queues into smarter, more efficient, and more accessible service experiences

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a future where waiting in line is obsolete, replaced by seamless, digital-first service experiences that prioritize convenience and efficiency.

realTime.title: Real-Time Updates
realTime.description: Stay informed with instant notifications and live queue status.

secure.title: Secure Booking
secure.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLanguage.description: Accessible to everyone with support for multiple languages.

integration.title: Easy Integration
integration.description: Seamlessly integrates with your existing business tools.

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
scheduling.description: Optimize your time with intelligent appointment booking.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Gain insights into customer flow and service performance.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push boundaries to create better solutions.

customerFirst.title: Customer First
customerFirst.description: Your experience is at the heart of everything we do.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We build systems you can count on, every single day.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We believe in open, honest communication with our users.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of businesses already using QuickQueue to streamline their operations.

hero.badge: We'd love to hear from you

contact.title: Send us a Message
contact.subtitle: Have questions about QuickQueue? Our team is here to help you get started and answer any questions you may have.

form.subtitle: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you

q1.question: How do I get started?
q1.answer: Simply create an account and follow the setup wizard to configure your business profile and queue settings.

q2.question: Is there a free trial?
q2.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial on all plans so you can explore all features risk-free.

q3.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q3.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard.

q4.question: Do you offer support?
q4.answer: Yes, our dedicated support team is available via email and live chat during business hours.

businessSolutions.heroTitle: Transform Your Business with Smart Queue Management
businessSolutions.heroDescription: Reduce wait times, increase customer satisfaction, and grow your revenue with our intelligent queue management system.
businessSolutions.featuresTitle: Everything You Need to Manage Queues
businessSolutions.featuresSubtitle: Powerful features built specifically for your business needs
businessSolutions.realTimeQueueDesc: Monitor your queue live with instant updates. See current ticket, waiting customers, and queue status in real-time via WebSocket connection.
businessSolutions.smartTicketDesc: Call next customer, skip tickets, mark as completed, or cancel. Full control over your queue with one-click actions.
businessSolutions.pauseResumeDesc: Take breaks without losing your place. Pause queue during lunch or emergencies, then resume when ready.
businessSolutions.walkinSupportDesc: Add walk-in customers directly to your queue. No app required for customers who prefer in-person booking.
businessSolutions.dailyStatsDesc: Track today's patients, completed tickets, average wait time, and queue performance metrics.
businessSolutions.instantUpdatesDesc: Customers get real-time notifications when called, their position updates, and queue status changes automatically.
businessSolutions.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs
businessSolutions.ctaDescription: Join hundreds of businesses already using QuickQueue to improve customer experience

payment.title: Complete Your Booking
payment.subtitle: Secure payment for your ticket reservation

notificationBell.title: Notifications

checkout.pleaseWait: Please wait while we redirect you to secure payment

booking.redirectInfo: You'll be redirected to the payment page to complete your booking. After successful payment, your ticket will be confirmed.

features.realTimeQueueDesc: Monitor and manage your queue in real-time. Call customers, track wait times, and optimize flow.
features.smartBookingDesc: Let customers book appointments online 24/7. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders.
features.analyticsDesc: Get detailed analytics on customer flow, peak hours, and service efficiency.
features.notificationsDesc: Keep customers informed with SMS and email notifications about their queue status.
features.secureDesc: Enterprise-grade security with 99.9% uptime. Your data is always safe and accessible.
features.easyIntegrationDesc: Quick setup in minutes. Integrate with your existing tools and workflows seamlessly.
